entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
